inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group used for end-effector and base visualization.

inputParameters.name: show_visual
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the robot's visual meshes.

inputParameters.name: show_collision
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the robot's collision meshes.

inputParameters.name: show_frames
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the robot's joint frames.

inputParameters.name: show_base_frame
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the robot's base frame.

inputParameters.name: show_end_effector_frame
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the robot's end-effector frame.

inputParameters.name: show_cm
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the collision meshes (if any).

inputParameters.name: show_acm
inputParameters.description: Whether or not to show the attached collision meshes (if any).

outputParameters.name: visual
outputParameters.description: Rhino meshes of the robot's visual geometry (if any).

outputParameters.name: collision
outputParameters.description: Rhino meshes of the robot's collision geometry (if any).

outputParameters.name: collision_meshes
outputParameters.description: Rhino meshes of the scene's collision meshes (if any).

outputParameters.name: attached_meshes
outputParameters.description: Rhino meshes of the scene's attached collision meshes (if any).

outputParameters.name: frames
outputParameters.description: The robot's joint frames as Rhino planes (if any).

outputParameters.name: base_frame
outputParameters.description: The robot's base frame as a Rhino plane (if any).

outputParameters.name: ee_frame
outputParameters.description: The robot's end-effector frame as a Rhino plane (if any).
